A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
+It was a decent movie. 
+Some beautiful settings and environments. and a few jaw dropping VFX shots.
-I didn't like the story\, i was never really invested in any of the plot lines or characters for that matter. Some of it seemed underdeveloped and some seemed slapped on just to add filler. 
-I didn't like the cinematography\, there was so many missed opportunities\, to build a emotional response.
-I love a few laughs\, but there was a bit too much slapstick comedy that seemed completely out of place\, when compared to The Force Awakens. 
-And then the movie ended on a low point. No real conflict\, nothing to care about and no real reason to be excited for the next movie. 
*Overall a decent popcorn blockbuster\, good entertainment\, but not something i would recommend.
